extends java.lang.Object
implements ToolComponentModel, OpenGroupComponentModel

      • getTaskAction

        public javax.swing.Action getTaskAction(Task task)
        Specified by:
        getTaskAction in interface ToolComponentModel
        Returns:
        the action that is invoked when the task is activated (e.g. double-clicked). If null is returned the default tool action is used; to do nothing return a DoNothingAction.

      • getTaskComponent

        public TaskComponent getTaskComponent(Task task)
        Specified by:
        getTaskComponent in interface ToolComponentModel
        Returns:
        the task component used to represent the specified task (if null is returned then the default component is used)

      • isUpdateIcon

        public int isUpdateIcon(Task task,
               java.lang.String action)
        Called to determine if an icon for the specified action should be displayed, e.g. ADD_INPUT_NODE_ACTION. Returns whether the icon should be displayed (DISPLAY_ICON), should not be displayed (HIDE_ICON) or the action is unknown and should be deffered to the default handler (UNKNOWN_ACTION). If the default handler does not know the action then the icon is not displayed.
        Specified by:
        isUpdateIcon in interface ToolComponentModel
        Parameters:
        action - the update action (e.g. ADD_INPUT_NODE_ACTION)
        Returns:
        either DISPLAY_ICON, HIDE_ICON or UNKNOWN_ACTION

      • getUpdateAction

        public javax.swing.Action getUpdateAction(Task task,
                                 java.lang.String action)
        Called to determine the action that is invoked when an update action is choosen.
        Specified by:
        getUpdateAction in interface ToolComponentModel
        Parameters:
        action - the update action (e.g. ADD_INPUT_NODE_ACTION)
        Returns:
        either the action or null if unknown.

      • getOpenGroupAction

        public javax.swing.Action getOpenGroupAction(TaskGraph taskgraph)
        Specified by:
        getOpenGroupAction in interface OpenGroupComponentModel
        Returns:
        the action that is invoked when a group is activated (e.g. the workspace is double-clicked). If null is returned the default workspace action is used.

      • getOpenGroupComponent

                                   TrianaClient client)
        Specified by:
